Layer.LoadCommand: %xero(function(self) local swaps = {} local cols = {l = 0, d = 1, u = 2, r = 3} local movex = {[0] = 'movex0', 'movex1', 'movex2', 'movex3'} local has = string.find local function lambda(path) path = path or '' local e = true if not has(path, 'l') then lambda(path..'l') e = false end if not has(path, 'd') then lambda(path..'d') e = false end if not has(path, 'u') then lambda(path..'u') e = false end if not has(path, 'r') then lambda(path..'r') e = false end if e then local list = {} for col = 0, 3 do local t = cols[string.sub(path, col + 1, col + 1)] list[t] = (col - t) * 100 end swaps[path] = list end end lambda() function swap(t) local which = t[4] for col = 0, 3 do t[4 + col * 2] = swaps[which][col] t[5 + col * 2] = movex[col] end ease(t, 1, 'swap') return swap end end)
